messages.subject: Re: a pimp kimono?
messages.msgSnippet: Can you imagine the groupies? Will they be called Tomoe Gozens and all wear backwards-facing hakama (sp?) like Ellen Barkin in Buckaroo Banzai ? Must...
messages.messageBody:
Can you imagine the groupies? Will they be called 'Tomoe Gozens' and
all wear backwards-facing hakama (sp?) like Ellen Barkin in 'Buckaroo
Banzai'?

Must... stop... laughter... aching... tears... ouch...

--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, Nate Ledbetter
<ltdomer98@y...> wrote:
>
> --- captainnemo12901 <captainnemo12901@y...>
> wrote:
>
> > what would snoop dogg wear in the line of a pimp
> > kimono? sequins and
> > fur-lined?! how about his wide floppy brimmed helmet
> > instead of a hat?
>
>
> I'm thinking a kawari-kabuto helmet, covered in purple
> leopard print fur, with a big dollar sign (yen sign?)
> as his maedate. Either that, or a helmet with fake
> corn-rows on the top.
>
>
>
> __________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] a pimp kimono?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m thinking a kawari-kabuto helmet, covered in purple leopard print fur, with a big dollar sign (yen sign?) as his maedate. Either that, or a helmet with
messages.messageBody:
--- captainnemo12901 <captainnemo12901@...>
wrote:

> what would snoop dogg wear in the line of a pimp
> kimono? sequins and
> fur-lined?! how about his wide floppy brimmed helmet
> instead of a hat?


I'm thinking a kawari-kabuto helmet, covered in purple
leopard print fur, with a big dollar sign (yen sign?)
as his maedate. Either that, or a helmet with fake
corn-rows on the top.

messages.subject: a pimp kimono?
messages.msgSnippet: what would snoop dogg wear in the line of a pimp kimono? sequins and fur-lined?! how about his wide floppy brimmed helmet instead of a hat?
messages.messageBody:
what would snoop dogg wear in the line of a pimp kimono? sequins and
fur-lined?! how about his wide floppy brimmed helmet instead of a hat?
